data.expected_result: It's supposed to say "Press ] to chat in @ {name} like it does when you are in a DM and it says "Message @ {name}"
data.short_description: When pinning a DM chat in the overlay, it says "Press ] to chat in #" instead of "Press ] to chat in @ {name}"
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the overlay - Pin a direct message - Observe under the widget what it says
